attributes.action: Require pubs to serve a full pint of beer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"If you do not require the traditional head on your beer tell us and we'll gladly top it off" Oh yeah? that's not what I see! I see a grumpy bar person making you feel a real tightwad if you dare to request a top up.
So pubs should be required to do the reverse ie serve a FULL PINT unless you ask other wise.
It should be the norm to request "a full pint of beer please" and that's what you should get.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
